column4: As per the advice given, I am switching my mobile phone to airplane mode. I hope committee members will all do the same. I propose that we go into private session to deal with some matters before resuming in public session. Is that agreed? Agreed.

The first petition for consideration is Petition No. P00021/18. The decision is that we forward a copy of the response received from the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport to the petitioner and close the petition. Is that agreed? Agreed. The next petition for consideration is Petition No. P00026/18. It is proposed that we forward a copy of the reply received from the Department of Health to the petitioner and close the petition. Is that agreed? Agreed. The next petition for consideration is Petition No. P00038/18. It is proposed that we write to the petitioner informing them that, as the Houses of the Oireachtas have just begun to consider the matter, the committee has decided to close the petition. Is that agreed? Agreed. The final petition for consideration is Petition No. P00016/18. It is proposed that we forward a copy of the reply received from the Department of Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht to the petitioner and close the petition. Is that agreed? Agreed.

It was fruitful for the committee to engage with RTÃ‰ on the issue. The orchestras may not have had an outlet within the Oireachtas. It proves the value of the petition received from Ms Joyce, for which I thank her. I thank Senator Horkan for attending.
